title: Dark Guardian: A New Dawn
description:
Following the events of 
DARK GUARDIAN,
 Ethan Daniels has fully embraced his alter ego of The Guardian. His mantle has become a symbol of hope for his nation. After two years of spearheading his mission against the corruption and injustice that has ruled over Crown City for so long, his mission is finally nearing its end. It is now the final weeks of the nationâ€™s revolution against the corrupt regime. But every burden takes its toll. The more that Ethan wages his war on countless fronts, the more he begins to lose himself to it. However, everything is not as it seems. From the shadows, a darker game is afoot that threatens to destroy everything that Ethan has worked so hard to create.
author: Ammar Habib
